translator_notes: 「脂评」refers to the commentary by Zhiyan Zhai (脂砚斋) and others, preserved in various manuscripts.
「汇校本」indicates this is a collated edition combining multiple sources (Jiaxu, Gengchen, etc.).
「抚琴居」(Fuqinju) is a prominent online community dedicated to Redology.
research_notes: Identified text as the digital edition title page.
